casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Junious Lee RHUE, Jr. No. 348P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of June 2005 by Defendant to be allowed to proceed in forma pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
